children.name: wrap
children.description: Wraps the latitude and longitude to fit into the [0, 90] and [0, 180] range.

children.name: toString
children.description: Returns the location coordinates formatted as '{lat},{lng}'.

children.name: toArray
children.description: Returns the location coordinates as an [lat, lng] array.

children.name: round
children.description: Rounds the location coordinates to the specified number of fractional digits.

children.name: equals
children.description: Compares this location with another instance.

children.name: distanceTo

parameters.name: bearing `Number`
parameters.description: The initial bearing to the destination in decimal degrees.

parameters.name: distance `Number`
parameters.description: The distance to the destination in meters.

children.description: Finds a destination at the given distance and bearing from this location.

children.name: destination

parameters.name: bearing `Number`
parameters.description: The bearing to the destination in decimal degrees.

children.description: Calculates the [great-circle distance](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Great-circle_distance)to the given destination in meters.

children.name: clone
children.description: Creates a new instance with the same coordinates.
